Question.Subject: Ok so its 8 pm help me?
Question.Content: so im going to stay up till atlesast 3am and im going to do stuff on the net and im already bored i know about omegle .com and kongredate.com and funnyjunk.com but im looking for anyother sites that will keep me amused for hours posably sites that i can sign up for . thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer:
www.failblog.com www.pictureisunrelated.com www.engrishfunny.com www.epicwinftw.com www.failbooking.com www.artoftrolling.com www.thisisphotobomb.com www.comixed.com www.oddlyspecific.com www.mylifeisaverage.com
That should keep you entertained for the time being and beyond.
